pattern.name: cut-in
pattern.code: match [ {faces = f1, scale = s1}, {faces = f2, scale < s1}, {faces = f3}] from shots where actor_relation(f1, f3) == SAME and actor_relation(f1, f2) == DIFFERENT

pattern.name: cut-away
pattern.code: match [ {faces = f1, scale = s1}, {faces = f2, scale > s1}, {faces = f3}] from shots where actor_relation(f1, f3) == SAME and actor_relation(f1, f2) == DIFFERENT
